documents.document: #USER# My therapist has made the same observation to me after years of therapy. Kids often withdraw out of safety, which makes sense then. We need to as adults learn to be safe while being a full member of society at the same time. And that's a very, very difficult lesson to learn.
#USER# Good on you. I've grown twice as much hair on my head as last week, so I'm having a really good go of things.
Wow, having a burning masks party & now having to suspend activities due to COVID? Hmmm, I wonder if they saw this coming. #URL#
#USER# There are some USL back lines I would trust more than several of the defenses in MLS era. 2015 was special beyond for sure.

The wind & rain are random as f**k out in West Gres-ham today, but that hasn't stopped the grounds crew at the school behind our house from running leaf blowers for the past 45 minutes straight. JFC. I loathe them. To no freaking end, I loathe those machines.

Yeah, it's one of our eight different cup competitions about something or other instead of working to strengthen the presence of USWNT players within their domestic league. I'm overly excited about this. #HASHTAG# #URL#
I don't even follow their teams & knew this poll would be doomed the minute they clicked Tweet. Wow. You would think they would know better. #URL#

#USER# #USER# Yeah, but there are some huge names on the list that I have seen, so we might be Ok here. Can only lose 1 player if anybody is selected & they can only choose 5 total so I can see where the odds are with us here. It's still unsettling though, but I'm believing beyond reason here.
#USER# #USER# #USER# Uh, okay. Pardon me while I fall off my chair laughing hysterically at the ineptitude of this idea. No, really, I think it could work. Really.

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# Shakey's was a huge staple of my youth in Boise. One of the few restaurants my family could all agree upon going to that didn't involve varying degrees of emotional mayhem (sister was very picky eater, stepdad was a complete jerk, mom just wanted food & peace, I loved pizza).
#USER# #USER# Match is on FS1 as well, so national audience for the broadcast. Wondering how that will influence things.

#USER# #USER# #USER# Yup. And while the logical side of me understands that, the emotional side is angry & frustrated at people who instead of doing what is best for everybody decided their choice was more important.

#USER# It's one of the various cup things to distract fans from the fact that USWNT really doesn't support their own domestic league. It's better if we make our monies from our own tournaments instead. Oh, wait, I said that out loud.

#USER# But throwing money at it & yelling into the void that we're awesome apparently is much more fun. Yet it's that belief that is ultimately killing off any momentum towards doing exactly what you stated - we accept what we are & work to make it better for the future.
Pfizer. Shot 1 was a relative breeze with few issues. Shot 2 put me in bed sleeping for most of a day, but once I was up later that day, I was absolutely fine. No soreness at all. #URL#
Waiting seriously blows. Thanks for the updates or lack thereof.

Thanks to #USER# for sharing this amazing story about an amazing person. I wished I had met him in person over my years within the TA, but I'm honored to have learned about how truly amazing Kevin is through sharing these stories. #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# Nope. I dig both sports honestly and am looking forward to the upcoming Olympics.

LRT: I've worked in the corporate world for 30 plus years & worked many days when I should have taken time off to help me. But I felt guilty about leaving my team in a lurch, but my health & psyche suffered in pushing myself. A day off could have done wonders for me in retrospect
